      • asignCompany

        public boolean asignCompany​(java.lang.String companyName,
                            java.lang.String companyNit,
                            int roomId,
                            int serversAmount,
                            int day,
                            int month,
                            int year,
                            double cacheMemory,
                            int processorsAmount,
                            int processorsTrademark,
                            double ramMemory,
                            int disksAmount,
                            double disksCapacity)
        Asign a mini room to a company
        Parameters:
        companyName - , name of the company
        companyNit - , nit of the company
        roomId - , id of the mini room
        serversAmount - , the amount of servers that are going to be hosted
        day - , renting day
        month - , renting month
        year - , renting year
        cacheMemory - , cache memory of the server
        processorsAmount - , amount of processors in the server
        processorsTrademark - , trademark of the processors of the server
        ramMemory - , amount of ram memory in the server
        disksAmount - , amount of disks in the server
        disksCapacity - , capacity of the disks of the server
        Returns:
        asigned
